d=null!=t.expire&&t.expire>=0?t.expire:60,a=t.success||function(){},c=t.error||function(){},i=t.key||n,v=t.type,h=t.skipCache,b=t.timeout||null,p=null,y=t.xhrConfigsCallback,l=t.data,u=null!=t.dataType?t.dataType:v,null==v&&(v=n.split("."),v=v[v.length-1]),g="json"===v,w="json"===u,(o=this.getCache(i,h,g))?void a(o):(m=s(e,n))?(y&&"function"==typeof y&&y(m),f="undefined"!=typeof XDomainRequest&&m instanceof XDomainRequest,m.onload||(m.onload=function(e){return function(){var n;return p&&clearTimeout(p),n=f||m.status>=200&&m.status<400,n?(o=m.responseText,g&&(o=JSON.parse(o)),e.complete(o,d,i,h,g,a)):(console.error("AjaxCache Request Error",m.status,m.responseText),c(m.status,m))}}(this)),m.onerror||(m.onerror=function(){return console.error("AjaxCache Request Error",m.status,m.responseText),c(m.status,m)}),"GET"!==e&&l?(w&&(l=JSON.stringify(l)),f?setTimeout(function(){return m.send(l)},0):m.send(l)):f?setTimeout(function(){return m.send()},0):m.send(),b&&(r=function(){return null!=m.abort?m.abort():void 0},p=setTimeout(r,b)),m):(console.error("AjaxCache Request Error","This browser does not support this operation"),c("500",m),m)},e.prototype.getJsonp=function(e,n){var t,o,r,i,s,c,l,u;return i=null!=n.expire&&n.expire>=0?n.expire:60,r=n.success||function(){},o=n.key||e,u=n.skipCache,c=!0,s="ajaxCacheJsonp"+this.jsonpId++,(t=this.getCache(o,u,c))?void r(t):(window[s]=function(e){return function(n){return e.complete(n,i,o,u,c,r)}}(this),e+=-1===e.indexOf("?")?"?callback="+s:"&callback="+s,l=a(s),l.src=e,void f.appendChild(l))},e.prototype.get=function(e,n){return this.request("GET",e,n)},e.prototype.post=function(e,n){return this.request("POST",e,n)},e}(),window.ajaxCache=new o,r=function(){function e(){}return e.prototype.insertJsOnScriptTag=function(e,n,t){var o;return t&&(n+="\n//# sourceMappingURL="+t),o=document.createTextNode(n),e.appendChild(o)},e.prototype.injectScriptTag=function(e,n,t,o){var r;r=a(t),r.src=n,f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectScript=function(e,n,t,o){var r;r=a(t),this.insertJsOnScriptTag(r,n,o),f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectLinkTag=function(e,n,t,o){var r;r=document.createElement("link"),r.id=t,r.type="text/css",r.rel="stylesheet",r.href=n,f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectStylesheet=function(e,n,t,o){i(n,t,o,null)},e.prototype.defaultHandler=function(e,n,t,o){window["tinyBasketResult"+e]=window["tinyBasketResult"+e]||{},window["tinyBasketResult"+e][t.toString()]=n},e.prototype.getHandler=function(e,n){return"js"===e?n?this.injectScriptTag:this.injectScript:"css"===e?n?this.injectLinkTag:this.injectStylesheet:this.defaultHandler},e.prototype.skipCacheRequestManager=function(e,n){return n.success(e)},e.prototype.getRequestManager=function(e,n){return!n||"js"!==e&&"css"!==e?"jsonp"===e?ajaxCache.getJsonp:ajaxCache.get:this.skipCacheRequestManager},e.prototype.require=function(e,n){var t,o,r,i,s,a,c,l,u,p,g,f,w;if(o=this,e)for(m(e)||(e=[e]),i=0,a=e.length;a>i;i++)l=e[i],w=l.url,f=l.type,u=l.skipCache||n,null==f&&(f=w.split("."),f=f[f.length-1]),r=this.getHandler(f,u),c=this.getRequestManager(f,u),g=l.success||function(){},p=l.sourceMap||"",s=l.id||l.key||"ajax-cache-id-"+Math.round(1e5*Math.random()),"string"==typeof g&&(g=window[g]&&"function"==typeof window[g]?window[g]:function(){}),t=function(e,n,t,r,i){return function(s){n.call(o,e,s,r,i),t(s)}},c(w,d(l,{success:t(f,r,g,s,p)}))},e}(),window.tinyBasket=new r,"undefined"!=typeof n&&n.exports&&(n.exports=window.tinyBasket)},{}]},{},[3]);</script><script>(function(){var n;window.glb=window.glb||{},glb.cdnComponents=glb.cdnComponents||[],glb.cdnComponents.push("menu"),glb.menuReady=!0,n=null!==window.noAutoLoadFN&&window.noAutoLoadFN,n||(glb.fnTimeoutMs=glb.fnTimeoutMs||2e3,null!==glb.fnTimeout&&clearTimeout(glb.fnTimeout),glb.menuReady&&glb.headerReady&&glb.reguaReady?glb.initFnCdn(glb.cdnConfig):glb.fnTimeout=setTimeout(function(){return glb.initFnCdn(glb.cdnConfig)},glb.fnTimeoutMs))}).call(this);</script>
</div><div id="glb-corpo" class="glb-corpo"><div class="publicidade publicidade-banner_floating"><div id="banner_floating" class="tag-manager-publicidade-container"></div></div><div class="row show-for-medium-up"><div class="column

src="http://s2.glbimg.com/knKONErDs1Mnlxte5Yez0nXm15I=/540x304/top/smart/http://s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/02/20/fernanda.jpg"></picture></div></a></div><div class="feed-text-wrapper"><div class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">Festival de Teatro de Curitiba</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon gui-icon gui-icon-clock"></i><span class="feed-post-time-label">há 6 horas</span></span></div><a href="http://g1.globo.com/pr/parana/festival-de-teatro-de-curitiba/noticia/fernanda-montenegro-abre-festival-de-curitiba-com-texto-de-nelson-rodrigues.ghtml" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">Fernanda Montenegro abre Festival de Curitiba com texto de Nelson Rodrigues </p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Evento desta noite de terça-feira (28) é fechado para convidados; programação segue até 9 de abril.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="3"><div><div class="feed-post type-materia"><div class="feed-post-body"><div class="_label_event"><a class="feed-post-body-resumo">Autor é um dos três negros que já levaram, em 48 edições, o principal prêmio da literatura britânica; ele também já publicou textos em falou sobre o fato de ser gay. Festa Literária Internacional de Paraty será de 26 a 30 de julho.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">&#039;Ideia de raça é uma mentira&#039;: americana branca que se passou por negra se diz &#039;transracial&#039;</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Ex-ativista por direitos dos negros nos EUA Rachel Dolezal, que dizia ser afro-americana até seus pais revelarem origem caucasiana, defende direito de optar por &#039;raça&#039; a que se sente pertencer.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" class="feed-post-body-resumo">Atriz ganhadora do Oscar está no Rio para lançar seu novo filme, inspirado em best-seller.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="10"><div><div class="feed-post type-materia"><div class="feed-post-body"><div class="_label_event"><a class="feed-text-wrapper"><div class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">Lollapalooza 2017</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon href="http://g1.globo.com/musica/lollapalooza/2017/noticia/show-de-melanie-martinez-e-eleito-o-melhor-do-2-dia-do-lollapalooza-2017-em-enquete-do-g1.ghtml" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">Show de Melanie Martinez é eleito o melhor do 2º dia do Lollapalooza 2017 em enquete do G1</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">The Weeknd (2º) e Duran Duran (3º) completaram o pódio no domingo. Strokes pegou quarto lugar; veja a lista completa com o resultado.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="load-more gui-color-primary-bg"><a href="/pop-arte/index/feed/pagina-2.html">Veja mais</a></div><!--!--></div></div></div></div><link id="bstn-external-style" type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" data-href="https://s3.glbimg.com/v1/AUTH_51034a7b511149ff823d11cbcd04b2b7/bastian/build/bastian.css"><script>'use strict';(function(b,c,d,e,f,g){function h(){Bastian({"items":[{"age":4304,"content":{"chapeu":{"label":"Rock in Rio 2017","url":"http://g1.globo.com/musica/rock-in-rio/2017/"},"image":{"cropOptions":{},"sizes":{"L":{"height":608,"url":"http://s2.glbimg.com/yN5ZUlxW9Sp6rVL_riDuAwSVgfU=/1080x608/top/smart/https://i.s3.glbimg.com/v1/AUTH_59edd422c0c84a879bd37670ae4f538a/internal_photos/bs/2017/H/B/DOuldXStixGuYHYZx5wQ/alicia-keys.jpg","width":1080},"M":{"height":456,"url":"http://s2.glbimg.com/3WlJo4Nx_zzWy3cU2159pP0XH5c=/810x456/top/smart/https://i.s3.glbimg.com/v1/AUTH_59edd422c0c84a879bd37670ae4f538a/internal_photos/bs/2017/H/B/DOuldXStixGuYHYZx5wQ/alicia-keys.jpg","width":810},"S":{"height":304,"url":"http://s2.glbimg.com/k9qCYNlmVA7HRY_bOrTUHSRjIAM=/540x304/top/smart/https://i.s3.glbimg.com/v1/AUTH_59edd422c0c84a879bd37670ae4f538a/internal_photos/bs/2017/H/B/DOuldXStixGuYHYZx5wQ/alicia-keys.jpg","width":540},"V":{"height":620,"url":"http://s2.glbimg.com/b9BS2RkBHMLtz9eFPcSmlD7wU6Q=/570x620/top/smart/https://i.s3.glbimg.com/v1/AUTH_59edd422c0c84a879bd37670ae4f538a/internal_photos/bs/2017/H/B/DOuldXStixGuYHYZx5wQ/alicia-keys.jpg","width":570}},"url":"https://i.s3.glbimg.com/v1/AUTH_59edd422c0c84a879bd37670ae4f538a/internal_photos/bs/2017/H/B/DOuldXStixGuYHYZx5wQ/alicia-keys.jpg"},"summary":"Alicia Keys canta no dia 17 de setembro, antes de Justin Timberlake; Def Leppard toca no dia 21 e Jota Quest dia 22.                     POP DE MENOR - Pequenas idades e grandes fã clubes
                </p></div></a></li><li class="card-lista-item "><a href="http://g1.globo.com/musica/noticia/2014/08/cantor-de-bomba-virou-decorador-fazer-sucesso-e-facil-dificil-e-manter.html" class="card-lista-item-link gui-image-hover "><figure data-track-click="clique | thumb imagem | posicao 8"
